event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected device if necessary, or contact Sun for support.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: An uncorrectable software problem was detected in the IO hostbridge's Data Management Unit which is preventing the system from functioning properly.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item: The Message ID: <tt>%MSGID%</tt> indicates a problem in the PCIe subsystem. The faulty components, as shown with <tt>fmdump</tt>, should be repaired in order to restore the system.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: Loss of services provided by the device instances associated with this fault
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: One or more device instances may be disabled
event_registry_properties.name: title
